values: A shiver is a shaking movement the body makes when someone is cold or scared.
I got shivers on my way home because it was so cold.
n. 颤抖，战栗；碎片 vi. 颤抖；哆嗦；打碎 vt. 颤抖；打碎

- n. 颤抖，战栗；碎片
- vi. 颤抖；哆嗦；打碎
- vt. 颤抖；打碎


时 态:  
shivered, shivering, shivers
